titles.title: PRISM Act of 2015
A bill to amend title 54, United States Code, to make Hispanic-serving institutions eligible for technical and financial assistance for the establishment of preservation training and degree programs.
Preservation Research at Institutions Serving Minorities Act of 2015
PRISM Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Preservation Research at Institutions Serving Minorities Act of 2015 or the PRISM Act of 2015
Makes Hispanic-serving institutions eligible for technical and financial assistance from the Secretary of the Interior to establish preservation training and degree programs.
